info.name: RozgarLink
info.description: Complete API Documentation for the RozgarLink Project.

item.name: auth
login
item.description: Login API's for both Workers and Employers

item.name: register
item.description: Registers/Creates Users based on all the details provided
Comprises of all the Authentication API's

item.name: worker

request.description:
Retrieves details of a particular Worker

> Status Code: **200 OK** 
  

``` json
{
    "message": "worker profile retrieved succesfully",
    "worker": {
        "worker_id": 20131,
        "name": "Harsh Jagtap",
        "contact_number": 901237254,
        "email": "harsh@gmail.com",
        "password": "Harsh123#",
        "sectors": [
            "Construction",
            "Farming"
        ],
        "skills": ["Farming", "Construction"],
        "location": "Wakad, Pune",
        "rating": 0,
        "language": [
            "English",
            "Marathi"
        ],
        "availability": true
    }
}

 ```

> Status Code: **404 Not Found** 
  

``` json
{
    "message": "worker with ID not found"
}

 ```

> Status Code: **500 Internal Server Error** 
  

``` json
{
    "message": "internal issue: something went wrong! please try again."
}

 ```

item.description: Folder holding all the data for API's related to workers

item.name: job

request.description:
Retreives details of all the Jobs

> Status Code: **200 OK** 
  

``` json
{
    "message": "successfully fetched all jobs",
    "jobs": [
        {
            "job_id": 1723,
            "employer_id": 20123,
            "title": "Construction Site Worker",
            "description": "A person who will help with all the tasks performed on a construction site",
            "skills_required": [
                "Construction",
                "Handling Cements and Bricks"
            ],
            "wages": 700,
            "duration_in_hours": 7,
            "status": "Active",
            "location": "Hinjewade, Pune",
            "deadline": "19-09-2023"
        },
        {
            "employer_id": "1202",
            "title": "Construction Site Worker",
            "description": "A person who will help with all the tasks performed on a construction site",
            "skills_required": [
                "Construction",
                "Handling Cements and Bricks"
            ],
            "wages": 700,
            "duration_in_hours": 7,
            "status": "Active",
            "location": "Hinjewade, Pune",
            "deadline": "19-09-2023"
        },
        {
            "employer_id": "1202",
            "title": "Construction Site Worker",
            "description": "A person who will help with all the tasks performed on a construction site",
            "skills_required": [
                "Construction",
                "Handling Cements and Bricks"
            ],
            "wages": 700,
            "duration_in_hours": 7,
            "status": "Active",
            "location": "Hinjewade, Pune",
            "deadline": "19-09-2023"
        }
    ]
}

 ```

> Status Code: **500 Internal Server Error** 
  

``` json
{
    "message": "internal issue: something went wrong! please try again."
}

 ```

request.description:
create a New job by providing basic job details.

> Status Code: **201 Created** 
  

``` json
{
    "message": "successfully created a new job",
    "employer_id": 20143
    "job_id": 28712
}

 ```

> Status Code: **400 Bad Request** 
  

``` json
{
    "message": "missing or invalid fields in request",
}

 ```

> Status Code: **500 Internal Server Error** 
  

``` json
{
    "message": "internal issue: something went wrong! please try again."
}

 ```

Retrieves details of a particular Job

> Status Code: **200 OK** 
  

``` json
{
        "job_id": 1723,

        "description": "A person who will help with all the tasks performed on a construction site",
 ```

item.description: Holds all the API's related to JOB's

item.name: employer

request.description:
Retrieves all the details of a particular Employer

> Status Code: **200 OK** 
  

``` json
{
    "message": "successfully fetched employer by id",
    "employer": {
            "name": "Harsh Jagtap",
            "contact_number": 901237254,
            "email": "harsh@gmail.com",
            "password": "Harsh123#",
            "sectors": [
                "Construction",
                "Farming",
                "Industries"
            ],
            "location": "Wakad, Pune",
            "verification_status": "False",
            "rating": 0,
            "language": [
                "English",
                "Marathi"
            ]
        }
    }
}

 ```

> Status Code: **404 Not Found** 
  

``` json
{
    "message": "employer with ID doesn't exist"
}

 ```

> Status Code: **500 Internal Server Error** 
  

``` json
{
    "message": "internal issue: something went wrong! please try again."
}

 ```

> Status Code: **200 OK** 
  

